title: Client Sux. L
body:
So, a couple times now I've joined a ranked Queue and when in Champ select the client has bugged out and turned completely black, forcing me to leave champ select. In the attached image (I've only edited out the usernames of people on my friends list.) I am actually in ranked champ select, but the entire client is black - I am forced to close the client, and this means incur the penalties related to leaving champ select.

What I want to know is, because it's the start of the new season, when I must close my client because issues like the above does that count as a loss in my placements?!

replies.body:
That is a game breaking bug. Do not play ranked until it's fixed.

What OS are you on?
